column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''5''' is the fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Translation from the Auld Elvish" — [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
